about_the_game:
Load Slinging VR Training

Train your professional skills in Load Slinging VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

In the VR simulator, you will learn how to choose the right type of slinging, depending on the process routing, which describes: the weight of the load, the dimensions of the load and the load capacity of the slings (your choice of textile or iron). You will learn how to properly hook, wrap around and install the slings for the load, make an initial lift to a height of no more than 200-300mm for spontaneous lowering of the load, and then move the load using the remote control around the hangar.

Load Slinging VR Training was developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers.

Our VR training is free in learning mode. Choose the subscription plan to obtain full functionality with training and exam modes, and extended usage time.

If you need extended corporate licensing for Load Slinging VR Training please contact us for the details.
